com.intel.bigdatamem

Class BigDataPMemAllocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.bigdatamem.CommonAllocator<A>
      • com.intel.bigdatamem.CommonPersistAllocator<BigDataPMemAllocator>
        • com.intel.bigdatamem.BigDataPMemAllocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Allocatable<BigDataPMemAllocator>, Allocator<BigDataPMemAllocator>, PMAddressTranslator

    public class BigDataPMemAllocator
extends CommonPersistAllocator<BigDataPMemAllocator>
implements PMAddressTranslator
    manage a big native persistent memory pool through libpmalloc.so provided by pmalloc project.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.intel.bigdatamem.CommonAllocator

        m_bufcollector, m_bufferreclaimer, m_chunkcollector, m_chunkreclaimer

      BigDataPMemAllocator(NonVolatileMemoryAllocatorService nvmasvc, long capacity, String uri, boolean isnew)
      Constructor, it initializes and allocate a memory pool from specified uri location with specified capacity and an allocator service instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BigDataPMemAllocator

        public BigDataPMemAllocator(NonVolatileMemoryAllocatorService nvmasvc,
                            long capacity,
                            String uri,
                            boolean isnew)
        Constructor, it initializes and allocate a memory pool from specified uri location with specified capacity and an allocator service instance. usually, the uri points to a mounted non-volatile memory device or a location of file system.
        Parameters:
        nvmasvc - the non-volatile memory allocation service instance
        capacity - the capacity of memory pool
        uri - the location of memory pool will be created
        isnew - a place holder, always specify it as true

    • Method Detail

      • enableActiveGC

        public BigDataPMemAllocator enableActiveGC(long timeout)
        enable active garbage collection. the GC will be forced to collect garbages when there is no more space for current allocation request.
        Specified by:
        enableActiveGC in interface Allocator<BigDataPMemAllocator>
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this allocator
